Get list of available datasets

Source: R/get_catalog.R
get_catalog.Rd

Get list of available datasets

Usage

get_catalog(lang = "fr", base_url_melodi = "https://api.insee.fr/melodi")

Arguments

lang

lang of metadata informations (default: fr)

base_url_melodi

API URL (default: https://api.insee.fr)

Value

a data.frame containing list of available datasets

Examples

get_catalog()
#> Request all catalog : https://api.insee.fr/melodi/catalog/all
#> # A tibble: 76 × 10
#>    identifier                 title_content subtitle_content description_content
#>    <chr>                      <chr>         <chr>            <chr>
